question: What disease is associated with a Malar rash?
ideal_answer: Cutaneous manifestations of SLE are frequently the presenting symptoms, typically noted in the classic malar "butterfly" rash;

snippets.text: Cutaneous manifestations of SLE are frequently the presenting symptoms, typically noted in the classic malar "butterfly" rash;
Malar rash is one of the three cutaneous diagnostic criteria of systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE).
